Writing an update or insert statement

Tina4 has an ORM to do most of the heavy lifting for you, on an object extending \Tina4\ORM, the save method handles the insert or update. 

 global $DBA;
 $DBA->exec ("update my_table set my_name = ?, phone = ?", "Name", "Phone");
 $DBA->commit(); //based on the database you use
